<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/auth/verify-email"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Verifies the user's email address using the token from email.
Idempotent - succeeds gracefully if already verified.
